PROMPT STRING ================= The base shell that completes RG-RPG, making it an interactive game, has even a prompt that helps in using the game. This is customizable by your needs, exporting the "%s" environment variable. Functions that you can currently use are: \u: Prints current user. \h: Prints host name, up to the first point. \H: Prints host name, full. \w: Prints current directory, replacing user's home with a tilde (~). \r: Prints a literal carriage return. \n: Prints a literal line feed. \\: Prints a literal backslash.
